title: New: Wild Heart – The Heartbeat The Soul
content:
Ah, young romance.

What a fickle yet loveable beast, ensnaring all those who wander into it’s treacherous waters. LA’s Wild Heart thrives upon the unexpected and cruel world of whirlwind love, with his pitch-shifted vocals and dangerously blasé production contributing to what is one of the finest pop tracks this year. Sure it’s remarkably simple, but who says music has to be complicated to be effective? Check out The Heartbeat The Soul below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
